name: dsa-brother-bot-fullstack
description: Full-stack DSA Brother Bot application with React frontend and Express backend

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.test: concurrently --names "FRONTEND,BACKEND" --prefix-colors "green,blue" "cd frontend && npm test" "cd backend && npm test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run lint" "cd backend && npm run lint"
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && echo 'Setup complete! Run npm run dev to start development servers.'
